subject: Horse Racing
American Pharoah (Race Horse)
Breeders' Cup (Horse Races)
lead_paragraph: American Pharoah will be among the horses competing in the season-ending championships, which are being staged at Keeneland for the first time.
snippet: American Pharoah will be among the horses competing in the season-ending championships, which are being staged at Keeneland for the first time.
